game.name: Titanium Hound
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Titanium Hound is retro-looking video game in cyberpunk genre, where you are going to pilot huge and agile exoskeleton to crush hordes of crazed security drones and abominations to uncover conspiracy carefully crafted by one of global corporations.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Titanium Hound is retro-looking video game in cyberpunk genre, where you are going to pilot huge and agile exoskeleton to crush hordes of crazed security drones and abominations to uncover conspiracy carefully crafted by one of global corporations.
